name: DesktopVRIK
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds VRIK to Desktop avatars. No longer will you be a liveless sliding statue~!
Adds the small feet stepping when looking around on Desktop.

It is highly recommended to use AvatarMotionTweaker alongside this mod.
changelog:
- Implemented fixes for terrible armatures that had broken knee bending, initial hip rotation, and initial step calculations.
- Added pelvis & chest weight sliders for heading angle limit option.
- Implemented bandaid fixes for disabled animator and avatars without fingers.
- Added options to use or remove toes from VRIK and find unmapped non-humanoid toe bones.
- Implemented VRIK platform motion while on a Movement Parent.
- Contact me if you find an avatar that is still broken.
